title: NTPC Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 25 Manager Posts
description: The National Thermal Power Corporation Limited (NTPC) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 25 General Manager, Additional General Manager, Senior Manager, and Manager Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech in Civil, Mechanical, and Electrical Engineering can apply for the NTPC Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can app...
